titles.title: A resolution recognizing the victims of Hurricane Rita 6 months after the disaster, commending the resiliency of the people of Southwest Louisiana and Southeast Texas, and committing to stand by them in their relief and rebuilding efforts.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 3/31/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses condolences to the victims of Hurricane Rita on the six-month anniversary of the disaster. Commends the resiliency and courage of the people of Louisiana and Texas. Expresses the Senate's commitment to providing necessary resources and to standing by the people of those states in relief, recovery, and rebuilding efforts.
